alert.note: Alert for Eastern Essex; Western Essex (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 23 at 2:06PM EST until February 24 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Up to one tenth of an inch of ice accumulations is expected along with snow accumulations of up to one inch. * WHERE...Portions of northern New York and central and southern Vermont. * WHEN...Until 1 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Main threat will be slick surfaces from freezing rain. Roads may ice over creating hazardous driving conditions for motorists.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Roads may appear wet, but temperatures are well below freezing creating icy surfaces. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.
